page.title: 08THE LITTLE FOLK
page.content: Roughfort is known for its fairies or "Little Folk".You can see many fairy thorns in the area,and the old people have a great belief in the fairies and their powers.There was one man who used to leave a bowl of meat outside the door at night,and this was usually eaten,he believed it was eaten by the fairies. The thorn bushes are not supposed to be harmed in any way or {WOE BETIDE {ANY ONE WHO CUT ONE DOWN}.There was once a farmer who did cut a thorn bush growing on a wall,and the next day one of his cows was grazing near the wall,when the wall fell and killed it.Fairies are not bad people,they may take milk from a cow in a field but repay the farmer by blessing the crops in his fields.
